results.author: garethmb
results.content:
Mortal Kombat Gives Fans Of The Franchise The Brutal Live-Action Version They Deserve
Fans of the Mortal Kombat series have known that the path to bringing the violent and controversial game to live-action formats has been a mixed bag. While the first film in 1995 was a decent hit; the follow-up in 1997 disappointed fans who had grown weary of the PG-13 take on the series.

results.author: msbreviews
results.content:
If you enjoy reading my Spoiler-Free reviews, please follow my blog @
https://www.msbreviews.com

Even though I consider myself somewhat of a gamer, I was never the biggest fan of the Mortal Kombat games, probably because I never really knew how to play them.

results.author: sykobanana
results.content:
I liked this more than I should have.  

I have tried the games, but am not into the fighting genre of games (although the Injustice series grabbed me for its story).  The previous movies were fun and didnt take themselves seriously - which was good, but they got too hammy and over the top.
